```{=html}
<script>
const map = L.map("forecast-map", {
  center: [50.56, -4.05],
  zoom: 8,
  zoomControl: true,
  scrollWheelZoom: false,
});

L.tileLayer("https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png", {
  attribution:
    '&copy; <a href="https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright">OpenStreetMap</a> contributors',
  maxZoom: 18,
}).addTo(map);

const markerLayer = L.layerGroup().addTo(map);
const slider = document.getElementById("time-slider");
const timeLabel = document.getElementById("time-label");
const timeHint = document.getElementById("time-hint");

const RAG_COLOURS = {
  Green: "#2ecc71",
  Amber: "#f1c40f",
  Red: "#e74c3c",
};

const dataUrl = "data/forecast.json";
let timeBuckets = [];
let forecastEntries = [];

const formatTimestamp = (ms) =>
  new Date(ms).toLocaleString(undefined, {
    weekday: "short",
    day: "2-digit",
    month: "short",
    hour: "2-digit",
    minute: "2-digit",
  });

const buildTimestamp = (entry) => {
  const base = `${entry.date}T${entry.period === "morning" ? "06:00:00" : "15:00:00"}`;
  return new Date(base);
};

const renderMarkers = (timeMs) => {
  markerLayer.clearLayers();
  const selected = forecastEntries.filter(
    (entry) => entry.timestamp.getTime() === timeMs
  );

  if (!selected.length) {
    timeLabel.textContent = "No forecast entries available for this time.";
    return;
  }

  timeLabel.textContent = `Forecast for ${formatTimestamp(timeMs)}`;

  selected.forEach((entry) => {
    const color = RAG_COLOURS[entry.vis_rag] || "#95a5a6";
    const circle = L.circleMarker([entry.latitude, entry.longitude], {
      radius: 14,
      stroke: false,
      fillColor: color,
      fillOpacity: 0.85,
    });
    const popup = `
      <strong>${entry.location_name}</strong><br/>
      ${entry.vis_rag} (score: ${entry.vis_score.toFixed(2)})
    `;
    circle.bindPopup(popup);
    circle.addTo(markerLayer);
  });
};

fetch(dataUrl)
  .then((response) => {
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}`);
    }
    return response.json();
  })
  .then((data) => {
    console.log("Raw data from forecast.json:", data);
    if (!Array.isArray(data) || data.length === 0) {
      timeLabel.textContent = "No forecast data available.";
      return;
    }

    forecastEntries = data
      .map((entry) => ({
        ...entry,
        timestamp: buildTimestamp(entry),
      }))
      .filter(
        (entry) =>
          entry.timestamp instanceof Date &&
          !Number.isNaN(entry.timestamp.getTime()) &&
          typeof entry.latitude === "number" &&
          typeof entry.longitude === "number"
      );
    console.log("Parsed entries:", forecastEntries.length);

    if (!forecastEntries.length) {
      timeLabel.textContent = "Unable to parse forecast timestamps.";
      return;
    }

    const bounds = forecastEntries.reduce((acc, entry) => {
      if (!acc) {
        return L.latLngBounds([entry.latitude, entry.longitude], [entry.latitude, entry.longitude]);
      }
      return acc.extend([entry.latitude, entry.longitude]);
    }, null);
    if (bounds && bounds.isValid()) {
      map.fitBounds(bounds.pad(0.2));
    }

    timeBuckets = Array.from(
      new Set(forecastEntries.map((entry) => entry.timestamp.getTime()))
    ).sort((a, b) => a - b);
    console.log("Time buckets:", timeBuckets);

    slider.min = 0;
    slider.max = timeBuckets.length - 1;

    const now = Date.now();
    const defaultIndex = timeBuckets.reduce(
      (closest, current, idx) => {
        const currentDelta = Math.abs(current - now);
        if (currentDelta < closest.delta) {
          return { idx, delta: currentDelta };
        }
        return closest;
      },
      { idx: 0, delta: Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY }
    ).idx;

    slider.value = defaultIndex;
    slider.disabled = false;
    timeHint.textContent = `${timeBuckets.length} available forecast slots`;

    renderMarkers(timeBuckets[defaultIndex]);
  })
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error("Failed to load forecast JSON", error);
    timeLabel.textContent = "Problem loading forecast data. Check the console for details.";
  });

slider.addEventListener("input", (event) => {
  const bucketIndex = Number(event.target.value);
  const targetTime = timeBuckets[bucketIndex];
  if (typeof targetTime === "number") {
    renderMarkers(targetTime);
  }
});
</script>
```
